It's a good idea to read my 'about me' before following. Only over 18s, please.

summary: It's weird no one brought up the Owl-men at NBA press conference right
title: It's weird no one brought up the Owl-men at NBA press conference right
body:
Me and Cricket were quite for a little while on the  escalator until I said, “It’s weird no one brought up the owl men, right?” 

“Yeah, it’s real weird. I thought somebody would mention. I didn’t know LeBron James would just go over and mention the fact that there is an owl man sitting there, but nobody ever brought it up and never spoke or nothing. He was just there being an owl man,” said Cricket.

“I totally don’t get it. I don’t know. Is it just like saying ‘Have you seen an owl man, ever before?’ ” I said.

“No, I’ve never seen an owl man. I didn’t even know there were owl men, but everybody else in the room was treating it super normally. There’s LeBron James; there’s presumably another person who plays in the same team as LeBron James; and then next to him in a business suit is a half-man, half-owl. Nobody was talking about it ever. I’m like, this is weird. We should bring up the fact. But then, am I ignorant? Am I just being ignorant, I’ve never heard of an owlman?” said Cricket.

“Yeah, that’s exactly what I was on. Maybe there was some news 20 years ago; there was an owl man thing? Do you think you would have heard about owl men? It’s so normal that he seems like an executive at this point. He’s not a cop executive so he doesn’t talk in press conferences, but he gets to sit down in the press conferences. He’s a big deal. I mean, good for him, but I feel people would bring this up more. You’d think they’ll talk in the news: this happened … and this and… LeBron doing this and the Jazz… also, the NBA knows him for he’s an owl man. Unless as you’re indicating, as I’m thinking, maybe the reason nobody’s brought this up is because owl men are just so normal that it’s just not news,” I said.

“Yeah, Good for the owl men or owl people. Should we call them owl people? Probably, whatever the term they prefer is the one we should call them,” said Cricket.

“Are you looking it up right now on your phone? “ I said.

“Yeah, I’m looking it up on my phone. I’ve typed in Google: is owl people a thing? No results. None whatsoever,” said Cricket.

“Really, no results? Nobody’s talked about this at all? So it was really weird that an owl person was at that meeting and nobody brought it up,” I said.

“I’m gonna check … what’s the other one? It’s not Google, it’s a different one? You know the word… I’m trying to think of it. No, no, there, I can …” said Cricket.

“Bing,“ I said.

“Yeah, Bing. Let me check. Bing. First, I’m gonna type it in. B-I-N-G. How do you say it?” said Cricket.

“Checking Bing. No results for owl people. I mean, there are results,” said Cricket.

“Really, there are?” I said.

“Yeah, but it’s pornography,” said Cricket.

“Okay. Drawn pornography?“ I said.

‘Yeah, drawn pornography,” said Cricket.

“Maybe it’s like a costume,” I said.

“No, because why was he flying around for a good portion of the conference?” said Cricket.

“Yeah, that is a point. Costume is… Elaborate owl costumes, despite how elaborate they are, can’t fly. If they could fly, whoever that costumer would be worth millions of dollars because he mastered personal flight which has been a huge thing that people have been working on for 30, 40 years pretty much average since airplanes were invented. Listen, you don’t have to tell me that one of the holy grails of the transportation developed is somehow for getting how to get personalized flying vehicles to people.” I said

“Okay, we’re agreed. It can’t be a costume; otherwise, the costumer would be a billionaire. At least the costumer is a peer artiste sort of person and does not care for money but only cares for making elaborate functioning owl man … owl person costumes.” Cricket said

It was then that the elevator doors opened and another owl person walked in. I looked pensively at Cricket. It wasn’t the same owl person that we saw in the meeting because this owl person had a skirt on. The door opened, and it was a whole floor of owl people. The owl person who was riding with us walked off into it and it closed.

“Oh my God! The NBA has a whole floor dedicated to owl people working there! What do you think? Do you think it’s another business that works on the same floor … rents on the same building as the NBA? Do you think the NBA would be able to afford its own office space? The NBA totally should be able to afford its own office space so … are they segregating the owl people?“ Cricket said

“Trump’s America, right? “ I said

“who” said Cricket

“um…maybe, the owl people are playing a different flying version of basketball. Owl basketball that only owl people can play because they have the ability to fly. “ I said

“A lot like that game from Harry Potter, you would think? “ said Cricket

“Yeah, the Quidditch thing. You know when I was working for ESPN, they made us cover one of those Muggle Quidditch game? I gotta tell you, that might be one of the saddest things I’ve seen.”

“What? You don’t cheer for the Austin outlaws “ said Cricket

“Oh you like that.” I said.

“I think it’s cool”  said Cricket

“I do wonder why don’t you just not do it without the broom. The broom seems to add nothing to game play.” I said

“But the broom is whatever holds the whole thing together If they play without the broom then it would just be a handball and nobody wants to watch people play handball.” said Cricket

“I guess that’s what I’m saying.“ said Cricket

It was in that the elevator finally arrived to the ground floor. Little known fact about the NBA headquarters, it has over 200 headquarters and we walked out leaving the mystery of the owl men forever in the winds.

title: The Movie Date
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2kguEFM

by Tortellini

Remus takes Sirius to the muggle movies.

Oneshot/drabble

Words: 150, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.title: Losers like me, are the coolest you can find
blog.description: Izzy, 19, Uk. I've been on Tumblr and into Klaine for about 8 years? (we will ignore Tumblr's over 13 rule shall we?) I write Fic Under the name of NightFlint on Ao3 feel free to check that out.

summary: Two fanfic types I can't get enough of
body:
Two fanfic types I can’t get enough of

Harry Potter 8th year. Where do they sleep? Does it actually matter if they go to lesson? The most stress free time of their lives, and normally Draco turns over a new leaf.

Kurt and Blaine fanfic that Kurt enrols in dalton and it’s a BORADING SCHOOL maybe Kurt and Blaine will end up sharing a room and the warblers are normally a bunch of goofballs. To top it all off Blaine is really really rich so their goes any worries Kurt may have about affording new you. And just… all their problems seem to float away

summary: Harry Potter Headcanon: Cats and Dogs
body:
Harry Potter Headcanon: Cats and Dogs

After the events of The Deathly Hallows, Delores Umbridge is able to talk and lie her way out of serving any prison time, but Harry still manages to see justice done for his former abuser. In fact, he gets a two-for-one deal.

You see, Harry convinces ministry officials that even though Voldemort is gone for good, he’s worried that some Death Eaters have gone underground to bide their time until they can get revenge on Harry by attacking his family. And there is one muggle relative in particular that he believes is especially at risk.

He also convinces the ministry that his “faithful old schoolteacher” is the only ministry employee he could trust with such an important job.

And THAT is how Delores Umbridge was permanently assigned to live with and protect Aunt Marge for the rest of her career.

P.S. Oh and obviously Delores was never allowed to use magic around Marge, except in the event of a Death Eater attack. (Which of course never happened because even Death Eaters could tell that killing Aunt Marge would be doing Harry a favor.)

summary: I Simified My OC Lee's sim version is obviously older than how he looks in-game—he's probably a seventh year here. I'll keep...
body:
I Simified My OC

Lee’s sim version is obviously older than how he looks in-game—he’s probably a seventh year here. I’ll keep adjusting him as time goes on; his skin appears to be darker in-game, so I might change that, and his eyes could be a little farther apart. His hairstyle is also not exact, but since he’s older as a sim, I’m thinking about switching his ‘do in-game in a couple years to that spiky one that costs gems. We’ll see.

Overall, I’m pretty happy with him. He makes for a handsome sim.

I’ll likely be making Rowan & Penny next, so stay tuned if you’re interested in this sort of thing. ^^’
